import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getAllCountries } from '../../redux/action-creators' const Detail = () => { const { id } = useParams() return (

{isCountry.name}

{isCountry.continents}

{isCountry.capital === null ? 'N/A' : isCountry.capital.replace(/[{}]/g, '')}

{isCountry.population}

Home
) } export default Detail
